title: K-Much change their name to Be.A + to reveal a new member | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me K-Much change their name to Be.A + to reveal a new member By jennywill 36 minutes ago 2,461 207 3 0 Google+ K-Much Ã‚ has changed their name to Be.A .
The boys had ran a poll asking their fans to choose their new name, and Be.A had ended up at the top of the list. Not only so, but they'll be recruiting a new member to join their comeback. SEE ALSO: K-Much asks fans to choose their new group name 
Their label revealed, " We're currently working on their album and aiming for a comeback within the first half of the year. We're going to strengthen communications with fans through team promotions as well as a revamping of their official channel, so please look forward to it. " 
The new member will be revealed on March 2. YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
